website_summaries.verdict: Delivers a high-gloss finish that outperforms some other epoxy resin coatings.
pros: Combination of materials provides greater results for self-leveling and removing bubbles than some other products
Has a high level of gloss, yet it's also tough
cons: Working time is lower than you would expect: begins hardening less than 10 minutes after mixing

customer_reviews.title: This stuff yellows terribly after a year.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this product.... Poured some countertops in my ice cream shop. After 1 year, my white marble effect counters are yellow. Covered some white tile with our company logo embedded within the resin and placed the tile surrounded by the same white tile and its the only one that stands out now because its yellow surrounded by white. Poured a kitchen countertop in one of my rentals.. Blue marble effect.. A renter placed a hot frying pan on it and it scarred the surface. Will have to sand and rebuff everything to match. I decided to go with SC instead.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Great epoxy best I could find after much research
customer_reviews.text: Love this epoxy. Iam a professional remodeler and finisher. This product is very easy to use. Take your time follow instructions to a tee. If you fail to be confident and don't follow instructions you will have a hard time and this is with all epoxy. Watch as many YouTube videos from countertopepoxy you can. Go to countertop epoxy.com read everything. And you will have a gorgeous end result. Purchased and used 12 gallons in last week.
customer_reviews.author: Young-Towns-Refinishing

customer_reviews.title: Experienced user, great results
customer_reviews.text: I am a faux finisher and have 8 years experience using a different type of epoxy. I have been on the hunt for a better product and came across this one. I have been very pleased with the application. My counters have been smooth as glass. I do follow the instructions to a T as I know how difficult epoxy can be and have had no difficulty with this product. I will continue to update my reviews as time goes on. I'm hoping for a more scratch resistant and uv resistant product than the one I was using prior, so only time will tell!
customer_reviews.author: J. Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: It flowed and self leveled wonderfully. It only has about 30 minutes to work ...
customer_reviews.text: This was my firsttime using Epoxy over large surface. It flowed and self leveled wonderfully. It only has about 30 minutes to work with before it starts to become difucult to work with. Dried totally in 2 days.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan Hampton

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: We used it to cover up our old countertops. We were super careful to follow the directions and felt that we had about 45 minutes and could still manipulate it. I spayed paint into the epoxy and dragged the paint with a stick and it came out great! We used a torch at the end to bring out the bubbles and it leveled perfectly. The only thing that might be a negative is that is does scratch on the surface but we are able to buff it out pretty easily. Buying more!
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: This epoxy is amazing! No other epoxy I've tried comes even close
customer_reviews.text: This epoxy is amazing! No other epoxy I've tried comes even close. I will not use or recommend any other. If you want to do an epoxy coating right the first time, this is your go to. I took the baking pan out of the oven and sat it on the counter with no protection while slowing the food to cool. After approximately 10 minutes I removed the baking pan. There was not even a slight imprint of a burn or indication that a pan of hot food had been there. I did the same a fry pan after cooking pancakes, no imprint at all. Thank you for making this available and at such a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Asia C. Love

customer_reviews.title: I have had much better results with other epoxy in the past
customer_reviews.text: Followed the directions perfectly, and the epoxy came out cloudy and had lots of bubbles even with using a plumbers torch. I have had much better results with other epoxy in the past. I only went with this epoxy because it is supposed to be UV resistant.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work!
customer_reviews.text: Did my kitchen countertops with this stuff. About a year later, and they still look amazing! I ordered the base coat coloring from the same company "countertop epoxy", and got the mica powder pigments from "black diamond pigments" here on amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Ilya Zubarev

customer_reviews.title: fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully clear and easy to use. Nice finish. Will definitely order more for whatever I need.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is the best product.
customer_reviews.text: We did our research. We have worked with this product in many of our renovation counter top projects and trust this product. This one will not yellow and can take heat better then other products.
customer_reviews.author: Funnpuppy

customer_reviews.title: Not a crystal clear resin epoxy.
customer_reviews.text: Very dissappointed, this was supposed to be a clear resin and as you can see it turned out very yellow. Bottle B mix had a strong yellow tint to it, it I figured when mixed to part A it would be clear, wrong! Not crystal clear as advertised. My white counter tops are yellow. Not happy!
customer_reviews.author: Roberta Longenecker

customer_reviews.title: Very yellow
customer_reviews.text: Ive been buying this for 2 years. Started out good but now it comes with a very strong yellow tint. They tell you to buy the more expensive stuff and its clear. There are many great CLEAR epoxys for cheaper price that have the same characteristics. This is probably the worse epoxy for its yellowing. DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.author: Angry Customer

customer_reviews.title: First time and it turned out PERFECT!
customer_reviews.text: Hands down amazing stuff!! I definitely recommend it. My mixtures where a little off but it was rock solid within 24 hours. It was my first time using this stuff... now I want to epoxy everything!!
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Waller

customer_reviews.title: This is not what they claim. Terrible purchase
customer_reviews.text: Work time is only 15 minutes or so. The description is from the premium but this is standard and I don’t even think it’s actually countertop fxpoxy. Worthless product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yellow
customer_reviews.text: Product was incredibly yellow, basically the color of the single star I'm leaving. This used to be my favorite epoxy but it’s becoming my least favorite. Rep was unhelpful with trying to find a solution.
customer_reviews.author: Simply Snow Designs

customer_reviews.title: This epoxy delivered results better than I even imagined
customer_reviews.text: This epoxy delivered results better than I even imagined. Mixing this product thoroughly is really important so don't stop stirring. The more aggressive the better. The finished product was so clear and so shiny i still can't believe how well it turned out.
customer_reviews.author: Jon M

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Was first time using a product like this followed instructions turned out great
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: A+ great experience and great product. Thanks again for your customer service
customer_reviews.text: Great customer service, fantastic product much higher quality than retail epoxy. Would certainly deal with again
customer_reviews.author: Mikey Valente

customer_reviews.title: ... finished produced is what I was looking for - like glass, it's beautiful
customer_reviews.text: The finished produced is what I was looking for - like glass, it's beautiful. You just have to work fast once you pour it on, other than following the instructions to a "T".
customer_reviews.author: Judy Garci

customer_reviews.title: Great product, particularly for my purposes in fine art ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product, particularly for my purposes in fine art assemblage's. Good communication and assistance from the seller of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: After using this epoxy on my countertops after drying it ...
customer_reviews.text: After using this epoxy on my countertops after drying it turn out beautiful
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't be happier with my new counter tops! Easy to use and the company answered all my questions.
customer_reviews.author: Mosey Doodle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good stuff, fast shipping, this item is exactly what is describe.
customer_reviews.author: Alain

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with
customer_reviews.text: a very simple product to use. Very happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer C.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, instructions are clear about the procedure. Would suggest getting more than you think you need. Customer service was great!
customer_reviews.author: CodyB.

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: Installed it on a concrete counter top a couple years ago. Good product!
customer_reviews.author: vickie

customer_reviews.title: Looks great in the end but it is very temperamental and ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks great in the end but it is very temperamental and a pain to apply. If you don't put it on with the temperature just right and the measurements exact you will not be happy. I actually stirred it too much and it hardened before I could finish so I had to re-sand the entire shelf I did. It was a little disappointing since I followed the directions perfectly but only had 7 or 8 minutes to work with it before it was too late.
customer_reviews.author: Lodgepole

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product very satisfied with the result will and have recommended this product
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: awesome product
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS THE BEST EPOXY AROUND!!!! WITHDTANDS HIGHER TEMPERATURES VERY CLEAR FINISH VERY DURABLE
customer_reviews.author: Vince Hebert

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product for a good hard finish
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product for a good hard finish. I used it on a pine table and it worked very nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Darren Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Easy to mix
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Easy to mix. Easy to apply. NOTE: Removing the bubbles with a torch takes patience. I regret not taking enough time and keeping a watchful eye on the epoxy as it dried. I used a propane torch and thought after 15-20 minutes all the air bubbles were removed. In the morning, I discovered there were quite a few larger bubbles that formed while I stepped away. Overall, it's a great product and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew J Ozark

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product and great company to work with! Will definitely use them again, and highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: kimberly Davidson

customer_reviews.title: 2 part epoxy
customer_reviews.text: packaged securely and arrived promptly, follow the directions and its easy to use. we made countertops, 3 coats for a beautiful 3D effect. We strongly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Home bar top looks awesome!
customer_reviews.text: i bought this for use on our home bar top. This was my first time using an epoxy and had read several nightmare reviews about the challenges in using it. I had looked at multiple brands and eventually decided to use this oroduct from countertopepoxy.com. This product worked fantastic and my bar top looks great! Highly recommend this product to everyone. There product support line was also very helpful and knowledgable.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: So far this stuff works great. There's a bit of a learning curve for ...
customer_reviews.text: So far this stuff works great. There's a bit of a learning curve for using epoxy but this product is still easy to use and creates a hard, glossy finish.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Elder

customer_reviews.title: Penny floor
customer_reviews.text: Great product and helpful staff with any questions I had. Follow the instructions and no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Boatmead1

customer_reviews.title: Bubbles for days bro.
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for something without little f-ing bubbles then keep looking. Stirred for f-ing ever...eveeeer. ridiculous amount of stirring. Hated it.
customer_reviews.author: Stefan

customer_reviews.title: Buy this and follow directions= Awesome.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to level/fill a bar top, 2'x7' at 1/4 inch deep. Followed the directions to a "T", times, temps, heat gun, etc...even contacted the manufacturer prior to ensure everything was good to go (they were very helpful btw). Looked rough when first applied, then after we hit it with the heat gun it was perfectly transparent. Gave it 3 days and it did not change in appearance at all, but hardened like a rock. Very happy with this product! However, we mis-judged the volume a hair, so if you're doing a project the same size, I recommend you get this plus a two quart size.
customer_reviews.author: eodcheetah

customer_reviews.title: Setup so fast could not get air bubbles out
customer_reviews.text: Did not self level like it claimed pour over a perfectly level countertop and bar started setting up within 15 mins mixed it exactly like it said. Followed directions to the T and had high spots that wouldn't level out and setup so fast didn't have time to get all air bubbles out ruined my countertops hopefully buffing will make it look a little better but mad at the whole experience and the money I am out for my wood counters and bar and the cost of epoxy for cloudy air bubbled wood. Had some many air bubbles it was white when we poured it. Total ripoff if you want clear beautiful epoxy hire a professional
customer_reviews.author: jennclark82

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: no directions in the box. took me forever to figure it out
customer_reviews.author: bob jansen

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Needed a way to seal and smooth tiles on an outdoor installation. followed the directions exactly and used the propane torch to lightly go over the epoxy and all the bubbles just disappear. crystal clear finish, and so easy to do. Great product for outdoor use since it is UV resistant and has a 500degree temp rating. If you need to tape off an area though the blue painters tape works great. Just make sure the tape doesn't have any decals or markings on the tape other wise the tape decals will transfer to the clear epoxy. I was fortunate that I was able to remove the marks with goof off.
customer_reviews.author: Michael T.

customer_reviews.title: great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I had a question and called the customer service from their website and talked to one of the guys that works with this epoxy. He answered all my questions and gave me tips. I was very impressed. I can't wait to get this stuff and give it a try.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hostetter

customer_reviews.title: Did not apply anywhere as easily as I had hoped on my concrete countertops
customer_reviews.text: The company was great, could not have been nicer!! Did not apply anywhere as easily as I had hoped on my concrete counter tops. The Epoxy when mixed was very thick so ity did not find it's own level very well. I wish now I would have just bees waxed them now. :(
customer_reviews.author: joseph e salgot

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Mind their instructions in that you please DO NOT USE INDOORS!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Curiously Byronical

product_meta.title: Countertop Epoxy - FX Poxy - UV Resistant Resin - 2 Gallons (Ultra Clear, 40 sq ft)
product_meta.description:
Includes 1 gallon part A and 1 gallon part B to a total of 2 gallons Countertop Epoxy FX Poxy UV Resistant, to cover 35-40 Sq Ft

Cover your newly built or existing Countertops, Bar Tops or Table Tops with our professional grade solid resin epoxy for a lifetime finish!

FX Poxy from Countertop Epoxy is resin specifically designed for Kitchen Countertops, Bar Tops, and many other surfaces to create an extremely thick, maintenance-free finish also has special polymers that make it the most UV-resistant epoxy in the industry.

Not only is this product great for improving your home, but it also has many amazing other uses. 
Create DIY coffee tumblers or coat over your artwork to use a protective layer.
, 
There are endless project ideas that can come from using this clear, durable epoxy.

Apply FX Poxy directly over:
-Concrete
-Wood
-MDF
-Formica
-Laminate
-Ceramic
-Tile-Granite
-Virtually any other surface

⁕NOTE:Due to temperature restrictions, it is not recommended to allow packaged material to sit outdoors, therefore a signature is automatically required for delivery.

Standard Epoxy is not recommended for outdoor use or over white. Premium FX is recommended, which can be found on our website

Please call our office at 970.639.9338 if you have any questions!😊


Please note that this product is formulated to provide excellent results when used for flat, thick-mil applications such as tables and countertops. It is NOT formulated for use in creating tumblers.
feature_bullets: UV Resistant, stain resistant, and scratch resistant
Ultra clear resin made for countertops, bartops, tables, and much more
Very durable, 5 times stronger than concrete
Quick application - use your countertops in 36 hours!
Eco-friendly, food safe, non-toxic application, & odorless

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars134 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
